Title: Quantum Advances in Pharma: Bridging AI and Quantum Computing for Drug Discovery
Abstract: Unveil how AI & Quantum Computing are revolutionizing drug discovery, slashing costs by 70% and accelerating market readiness. Join us to explore groundbreaking integrations shaping the future of pharmaceuticals. Don’t miss out on this cutting-edge innovation.

Title: Quantum Computing: Revolutionizing Network Management with AI
Abstract: Unlock the future of network management with quantum computing! Discover how integrating quantum technology with AI predicts disruptions, optimizes traffic, and cuts costs. Join us to explore groundbreaking advancements making networks smarter, faster, and more efficient.

Title: How to measure what you cannot see: Using Causal AI to quantify how non coding activity drives hard engineering metrics like Lead Time.
Abstract: Only 10% - 20% of a developer's time is coding. There is a lot of work or even "glue work" that goes into it that is very often invisible. Learn what the biggest hidden outcome drivers in software engineering are, based on the most complete dataset of developer behavior ever assembled.

Title: Quantum Computing Meets Generative AI: Harnessing Creative Power While Mitigating Risks
Abstract: Unleash the power of Quantum Computing with Generative AI at Conf42.com! Learn how to harness creative potential while minimizing deep fake risks. Discover advanced detection algorithms, cryptographic watermarking, and collaborative tools to secure a trustworthy digital future.

Title: Empowering Quantum Computing: Harnessing the Power of LLMs in Application Development
Abstract: Explore how quantum computing and LLMs like GPT, BERT, and Turing NLG are redefining application development. Discover how they amplify productivity, boost detection accuracy by 80%, and streamline workflows with Hugging Face, Bedrock, and SageMaker.

Title: Leveraging Cloud Abstractions to Drive Generative AI: Scalability, Efficiency, and Diverse Applications
Abstract: Discover how Gen-AI, projected to add $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030, is revolutionizing industries from healthcare to creative arts through cloud technologies. Learn about its explosive growth, critical cloud integrations, and the future of AI in transforming business and innovation.

Title: Mastering Cloud Security Automation: A Comprehensive Guide to Terraform and Chef Integration
Abstract: Discover how to fortify your cloud security effortlessly! Dive into the seamless integration of Terraform and Chef, where infrastructure-as-code meets robust configuration management. Uncover best practices, real-world case studies, and future trends.

Title: Advancements in Quantum Warfare
Abstract: The talk signifies the progress in quantum techs in the military. It covers the breakthroughs and applications of quantum technology in warfare, highlighting how these advancements are transforming military strategies and operations, and their potential impact on national security and defense mechanisms.

Title: BluLyte_Risk Correlated Predictive Analytics Platform for Black & Grey Swans
Abstract: The required assessment to determine systemic risk exposure will require advancements in financial innovation for the global financial system, such as blockchain with smart contracts with the convergence of AI/ML and Quantum Computing to determine exposures before they happen.

Title: Standardized Dev Environments:  Improving Productivity while Enhancing Developer Experience
Abstract: The audience will gain insights into standardization of both local and remote dev environments, scalability strategies, and security measures as well as real-world case studies that will showcase accelerated development cycles, providing valuable insights into the future of development practices!

Title: High level programming for quantum circuits
Abstract: In this pitch, I will talk about the benefits of programming a quantum program with a high level instead of a traditional gate-based approach. This method will allow higher productivity and more efficient quantum circuits.

Title: Revolutionizing Cybersecurity: The Role of Generative AI in Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance
Abstract: Discover how Generative AI is transforming cybersecurity in our talk on its integration into Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance (GRC). Learn how AI-driven automation enhances security efficiency by 40%, predicts threats 30% better, and reduces compliance violations by 25%. Join us.

Title: Quantum Computing: Building Responsive and Adaptive Systems for the Future
Abstract: Explore the future of adaptive systems in the era of quantum computing! Learn how quantum algorithms and modern design principles transform performance and scalability.

Title: The Elusive Phase Operator: Unraveling Quantum Mysteries
Abstract: The elusive phase operator for oscillators has puzzled scientists since quantum inception. This talk explores the latest breakthroughs, tracing back to Dirac’s phase operator dilemma. Discover how phase and angle operators intertwine and the cutting-edge formulations shaping our understanding today.

Title: Entanglement and a Quantum Computing Future
Abstract: What is it & why IT will be the most pressing topic as it's where the future is created. It's what Einstein was working on when he died. More on the latest with Bohr, Susskind (lately), Schroedinger...etc. It's where many future discoveries will come from. Is it what links us all together?

Title: Quantum Computing Technology for Material Science
Abstract: Quantum Computing Technology represents many opportunities in every field of life. These opportunities become real with material science. How about developments in materials science regarding quantum computing technology?

Title: Introducing QC2: A Modular Open-Source Software for Quantum Chemistry with Quantum Computers
Abstract: This presentation features QC2, an open-source software that seamlessly integrates computational chemistry codes with quantum computing frameworks. Designed for hybrid workflows, QC2 relies on ASE calculators to efficiently offload electron integrals for various quantum computing SDKs.
